name: DeathForest ~ Escape from the forest ~ [Proliferation]
description:
Let's freeze with a terrifying horror! [Online novelization]

[Story]
One summer day when it became hot and humid, there was a Japanese man who enjoyed a carefree trip on a moped.
My current location is somewhere in Fukui prefecture, and sometimes it's dusk. The hotel I reserved is still far away, "I can't make it in time."
While drinking canned coffee at the parking lot of the convenience store, grasping the current situation, suddenly checking the map on the smartphone,
Notice that there is. "If you go through here, you don't have to go around the forest to get there, right?"
The map did show a thin line through the woods. The man who poured coffee all at once grabbed the steering wheel .....

【way of proceeding】
Explore the woods, get 4 bike parts (white objects) and secure an escape route
You can escape by returning to the bike after doing. Also in this forest is the end of the victims of the murders that once occurred in this forest (enemy). I will follow you, but please sprinkle it well and run away! Also, if you collect the forgotten memories (white square objects) scattered on the stage, you can see them in the bonus menu.
If you touch it, you will die instantly and return to the beginning, so be careful!
